attributes.action: Stop applying new immigration rules to existing Skilled Worker visa holders
attributes.additional_details:
1. Grandfather existing Skilled Worker visa holders under the rules that were in place when they received their visas.
2. Maintain the original 5-year ILR route.
3. Provide clarity and protection for families and dependents already residing in the UK.
4. Recognize the significant long-term financial and social planning that has already been made by these individuals.
5. Thousands of skilled workers have made long-term financial commitments, including mortgages, family planning, and education.
attributes.background: We urge the government to exempt existing skilled workers from the newly introduced immigration rules, including the settlement period changes & job code restrictions. These individuals made life-changing decisions, such as relocating families, paying higher taxes, and contributing to the economy.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Keep the 5-Year ILR pathway for existing Skilled Worker visa holders
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727360
